metadata.name: Life Cycle: A Tale of Biological Terror
metadata.description: Vaughn is a down-and-out alcoholic physician who jumps on a chance to revive his troubled career: he becomes the medical provider for an isolated outpost on a barren, ice-covered moon. When a mysterious rash spreads through his patients, Vaughn must earn their trust—and conquer his own self-destructive demons—to save them all from the overpowering hysteria that threatens to consume the outpost.
